scripts.build:copy:src: shx mkdir -p add-on/dist && shx cp -R add-on/src/* add-on/dist
scripts.build:copy:ui-kit:ipfs-css:css: shx mkdir -p add-on/ui-kit && shx cp node_modules/ipfs-css/ipfs.css add-on/ui-kit
scripts.build:copy:ui-kit:ipfs-css:fonts: shx mkdir -p add-on/ui-kit/fonts && shx cp node_modules/ipfs-css/fonts/* add-on/ui-kit/fonts
scripts.build:copy:ui-kit:tachyons: shx mkdir -p add-on/ui-kit && shx cp node_modules/tachyons/css/tachyons.css add-on/ui-kit
scripts.build:bundle-all: npm run bundle:generic && cross-env RELEASE_CHANNEL=${RELEASE_CHANNEL:=dev} npm run bundle:firefox:$RELEASE_CHANNEL || npm run bundle:firefox
scripts.bundle:generic: shx cp add-on/manifest.common.json add-on/manifest.json && web-ext build -a build/generic
scripts.bundle:firefox: shx cat add-on/manifest.common.json add-on/manifest.firefox.json | json --deep-merge > add-on/manifest.json && web-ext build -a build/firefox/
scripts.bundle:firefox:beta: shx cat add-on/manifest.common.json add-on/manifest.firefox.json add-on/manifest.firefox-beta.json | json --deep-merge > add-on/manifest.json && web-ext build -a build/firefox/beta/
scripts.ci:install: npx yarn@1.9.4 install --frozen-lockfile || npx yarn@1.9.4 install --frozen-lockfile
scripts.ci:build: ./ci/update-manifest.sh ; npx yarn@1.9.4 build ; chmod -R ugo+rwX build/ add-on/
scripts.beta-build: docker build -t ipfs-companion . && docker run -it -e RELEASE_CHANNEL=beta -v $(pwd)/build:/usr/src/app/build ipfs-companion yarn ci:build
scripts.release-build: docker build -t ipfs-companion . && docker run -it -e RELEASE_CHANNEL=stable -v $(pwd)/build:/usr/src/app/build ipfs-companion yarn ci:build
